result.title: Comparative report on TCNs economic impact and entrepreneurship
result.description: D4.4 - Comparative report on TCNs economic impact and entrepreneurship including a policy overview, quantitative and qualitative findings on the economic impact of TCNs. In Task 4.4, GCU coordinates the comparison of national reports provided by all research partners. Specific attention will be devoted on how regional level regulations influence TCNs entrepreneurship and social entrepreneurship
